alert.note: Alert for Emmet (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 24 at 12:57AM CDT until October 24 at 1:30AM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 AM CDT FOR CENTRAL EMMET COUNTY... At 1256 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Wolden County Park, or 6 miles southeast of Estherville, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Ingham Lake, High Lake, Okamanpedan Lake, Swan Lake, Wallingford, Gruver, Dolliver, Okamanpedan State Park, Wolden County Park, and Estherville Municipal Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
